# Council Member Lloyd Worth

![Headshot of Council Member Lloyd Worth](https://www.brightonco.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=29813)

**Council Member Lloyd Worth, Ward 4**

[Email Council Member Worth](mailto:lworth@brightonco.gov)

**Phone:** 303-655-2260

**Terms:** 2024 - 2028

 **Currently serves on:** Adams County Regional Economic Partnership (AC-REP), Parks &amp; Recreation Advisory Board (Alternate), and Brighton Youth Commission. 

Lloyd Worth, Brighton City Council Member in Ward 4, has lived in Brighton since 1999.  He and his wife, Beverly, are proud parents of two grown children who both consider Brighton as their hometown. 

As the President/CEO of Brighton-based Worth Wealth Management, he works as an LPL Financial Advisor.  His business has operated in Brighton since 2010.  

Lloyd believes strongly in giving back to the community in which he lives and works and has served many volunteer hours in the Brighton community.  His first venture as a public elected official was eight years ago as a director for the 27J Schools Board of Education, where he ultimately served as Vice President and then President of the Board.  He also serves on the Brighton Legacy Foundation Board and is an adult commissioner for the Brighton Youth Commission.  In 2015, he was honored as the Citizen of the Year by the Greater Brighton Chamber of Commerce.

Lloyd is humbled by the opportunity to serve the City of Brighton as a member of the City Council.  He looks forward to providing thoughtful consideration to all matters brought before the council, to best represent the citizens of Brighton.
